Translations.Text: Mu by’ukuri inkuru ya Yusufu n'abavandimwe be irimo inyigisho ku babaza (bakeneye kumenya)

Wibuke ubwo (abavandimwe ba Yusufu) bavugaga bati “Rwose Yusufu n’umuvandimwe we (Benjamini) ni bo batoni kuri data kuturusha, nyamara ari twe benshi (tunafite imbaraga). Mu by’ukuri Data ari mu buyobe bugaragara.”
(Baravuga bati) “Nimwice Yusufu cyangwa mumute ishyanga, bizatuma so abakunda. Maze nyuma y’aho (muzicuze) mube abantu beza.”
Umwe muri bo aravuga ati “Ntimwice Yusufu, ahubwo mumujugunye mu iriba azatoragurwe na bamwe mu bagenzi, niba koko (mwagambiriye) kubikora.”
(Bamaze kunoza umugambi begera se) baramubwira bati “Dawe! Kuki utatugirira icyizere cyo kujyana na Yusufu, kandi mu by’ukuri tumwifuriza ibyiza?”
“Ejo uzamureke tujyane yidagadure anakine, kandi rwose tuzamurinda (nta cyo azaba).”
(Se) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri naterwa agahinda no kuba mwamujyana (kure yanjye), ndanatinya ko ikirura cyamurya mwe mwirangariye mutamwitayeho.”
Baravuga bati “Mu by’ukuri ikirura kiramutse kimuriye (duhari) turi benshi (tunafite imbaraga), twaba turi abanyagihombo.”
Maze bamujyanye, bemeranywa kumujugunya mu iriba, nuko turamuhishurira (Yusufu) tuti “Rwose (hari igihe) uzababwira iby’iki gikorwa cyabo batazi (ko ari wowe)!”
Nuko ku mugoroba (barataha) bagera kuri se barira

Baravuga bati “Dawe! Mu by'ukuri, twagiye gusiganwa (kwiruka no gutera amacumu) dusiga Yusufu ku bintu byacu maze ikirura kiramurya; ariko ntiwakwemera ibyo tukubwira kabone n’iyo twaba tuvuga ukuri.”

Banazana ikanzu ye iriho amaraso atari ay’ukuri. (Se) arababwira ati “Ahubwo imitima yanyu yabashishikarije kumugirira nabi (mubigeraho). Bityo, kwihangana ni byo byiza (kuri njye). Kandi Allah ni We wo kwishingikirizwa mu byo muvuga.”

Nuko haza abagenzi bohereza umuvomyi wabo (kubavomera amazi mu iriba), maze amanuye indobo ye (mu iriba, azamuramo Yusufu); aravuga ati “Mbega inkuru nziza! Dore umwana w’umuhungu!” Nuko bamuhisha (bagenzi babo) bamugira igicuruzwa. Kandi Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje w’ibyo bakoze
Nuko bamugurisha ku giciro gito; amadirihamu make. Kandi ntabwo bamushakaga (baramwikijije)

Nuko Umunyamisiri wamuguze abwira umugore we ati “Mwakire kandi umugirire neza, wenda yazatugirira akamaro cyangwa tukamugira umwana.” Uko ni ko twatuje Yusufu mu gihugu (cya Misiri, tumugira umunyacyubahiro) tunamwigisha gusobanura inzozi. Kandi Allah afite ubushobozi bwo gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo ashaka, nyamara abenshi mu bantu ntibabizi
Maze (Yusufu) amaze kuba igikwerere, tumuha ubushishozi n'ubumenyi (ubuhanuzi); uko ni ko duhemba abakora ibyiza

Nuko umugore yari abereye mu rugo agerageza kumureshya (ngo baryamane), ndetse anakinga imiryango maze aravuga ati “Ngwino unyegere.” (Yusufu) aravuga ati “Niragije Allah (ngo andinde ikibi)! Mu by’ukuri we (umugabo wawe) ni Databuja, yanyakiriye neza (sinshobora kumuhemukira). Rwose abahemu ntibazakiranuka.”

Kandi rwose (umugore) yaramwifuje, ndetse na we (Yusufu) yenda kubyemera; iyo ataza kubona ibimenyetso bya Nyagasani we (yari kugwa mu cyaha). Ibyo byari ukugira ngo tumurinde ikibi n’igicumuro (ubusambanyi). Mu by’ukuri we yari umwe mu bagaragu bacu b’imbonera

Batanguranwa ku rugi (Yusufu ahunga, undi na we amukurura) maze umugore aca ikanzu ya Yusufu mu mugongo. Nuko bahurira ku muryango n’umugabo we, maze (umugore) aravuga ati “Ni iki wakorera uwashatse kugirira nabi umugore wawe kitari ukumufunga cyangwa kumuha igihano kibabaza?”

(Yusufu) aravuga ati “(Uyu mugore) ni we wanyifuje”, nuko umuhamya wo mu muryango w'umugore atanga ubuhamya agira ati “Niba ikanzu ye yacitse imbere, umugore araba yavuze ukuri, naho (Yusufu) araba ari umunyabinyoma.”
“Ariko niba ikanzu ye yacitse inyuma, umugore araba abeshya naho (Yusufu) avuga ukuri.”
Maze (umugabo) abonye ikanzu ye (Yusufu) yacitse inyuma, aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri ibi ni bimwe mu mayeri yanyu abagore! Rwose, amayeri yanyu arahambaye.”
(Umugabo aramubwira ati) “Yusufu! Ubyirengagize (ntubivuge). Nawe (mugore) saba imbabazi z’icyaha cyawe. Mu by’ukuri wari mu banyamakosa.”
